ministry.name: Internet Ministry
ministry.overview: Wonder who puts this site together? The internet ministry pulls together all of the most current technologies to outreach over the web.

long-description.p: Learn more about our vision for this ministry.
long-description.heading: Want to help?
long-description.p: We are looking for anyone who knows how to perform basic computer operations, such as creating, editing, and copying files, for content management of this web site.
We also need help from people who know or are willing to learn any of the following technologies: XML, XSL, Java, Java Servlets/JSP, database technologies, and HTML/Javascript.
To learn how to serve, contact the web servant team at the email address at the bottom of this page.
